Title: Binding from Burning and Melting
Description: This binding from Walters manuscript W.649 is a modern western black leather binding (without a flap). An earlier red goatskin binding with gold-tooled frames attributable to the 13th century AH/AD 19th is housed separately.
Keywords: Islamic; Mughal; Persian; Safavid; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; India; Iran
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Anonymous
